_sText:
My 2nd map, this  map was designed for sniper wars. It has a 2 level war zone to keep things interesting. The top zone is connected by a single bridge in the middle, and both sides have good cover (which means one side has to rush and overpower the other or it becomes a sniper war). The lower area is a darker zone, with access to both the top level and the ground. Each side has many good sniper spots, shotty spots, and even a few spots that are best used with a SMG.

At a glance:

40 spawn points in all, 20 per side
nav pack included
very fun 
sniper/gg/dm friendly
good lighting (env and spot)
best for teamplay, but random battles are effective too
full buyzones
skybox

----------(>_<)----------

UPDATED: same map, some minor fixes + props
